object.name: editStory
object.description: Edits a story previously posted by the bot on behalf of a managed business account. Requires the can_manage_stories business bot right. Returns Story on success.
object.html_description: Edits a story previously posted by the bot on behalf of a managed business account. Requires the can_manage_stories business bot right. Returns Story on success.
object.rst_description: Edits a story previously posted by the bot on behalf of a managed business account. Requires the *can_manage_stories* business bot right. Returns :class:`aiogram.types.story.Story` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the story to edit
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the story to edit
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the story to edit
annotations.name: story_id

annotations.description: Caption of the story, 0-2048 characters after entities parsing
annotations.html_description: Caption of the story, 0-2048 characters after entities parsing
annotations.rst_description: Caption of the story, 0-2048 characters after entities parsing
annotations.name: caption

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the story caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.html_description: Mode for parsing entities in the story caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.rst_description: Mode for parsing entities in the story caption. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: parse_mode

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of *parse_mode*
annotations.name: caption_entities

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of clickable areas to be shown on the story
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of clickable areas to be shown on the story
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of clickable areas to be shown on the story
annotations.name: areas
